name: Unidentified_Koorivar_commander
content: A male Koorivar served as a commander for the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Clone Wars. The commander was present with at least 50 battle droids on Vallt when Galactic Republic Lieutenant Commander Orson Krennic, posing as an employer of Zerpen Industries, arrived with two Morseerian scientists for a prisoner exchange. Along with Chieftain Gruppe, the commander met with Krennic and when pressed as to who was in charge, the commander responded that he was there to ensure Krennic honored the terms of the exchange.
